description:
This is a market on whether Tanner Fox will KO, TKO, or retire Ryland Storms, in their “Battle of the Platforms (Youtubers v. TikTokers)” boxing match, scheduled to take place on June 12, 2021, at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens. This market will resolve to “Yes” if Tanner Fox KOs, TKOs, or retires Ryland Storms during their exhibition boxing match. For this market, “KOs, TKOs, or retires Ryland Storms” will be considered any of the following: (1) a true knockout, where Fox delivers a legal blow or series of legal blows, such that Storms falls to the canvas and cannot make the count, causing the fight to stopped early, (2) a technical knockout, where Fox delivers a legal blow or series of legal blows such that the referee intervenes to stop the fight early to protect Storms’s safety, (3) failing to answer to the bell, where Fox delivers a legal blow or series of legal blows throughout the match, such that Storms does not rise for the opening bell for a round, due to, for example, doctor stoppage, retirement from the match, “throwing in the towel”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

Update: If the match is postponed to a date on or before June 19, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after June 19, 2021 or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to "No".
